item.title: Integrating BibDesk with Dropbox.
item.description: I’ve implemented a powerful workflow for generating reports in APA style. It allows for a) all references that I come across to be stored in a central location and easily accessed; b) for this file to be synced and editable across multiple computers; and, c) auto-applies the stylistic requirements of APA style (proper formatting of headings, references, et cetera).
